citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process from 11:20am -
111:50am on November 25, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone. Failure to provide
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to
comply may result in enforcement action.
Please contact regarding availability.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process from 11:20am -
111:50am on November 25, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone. Failure to provide 
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to 
comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
Please contact regarding availability. 
 
 
End Section
